name: Sanjeev Kapoor
bio: Sanjeev Kapoor is an Indian celebrity chef, entrepreneur, and television personality. He has hosted several cooking shows on television and is the author of several cookbooks. He is also the founder of a successful chain of restaurants in India.

recipes.name: Butter Chicken
recipes.method: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices, cook in a tomato and cream-based sauce

recipes.name: Palak Paneer
recipes.method: Cook spinach and spices, add fried paneer and tomato-onion gravy

name: Vikas Khanna
bio: Vikas Khanna is an Indian-American chef, restaurateur, cookbook writer, filmmaker, humanitarian, and judge on the television show MasterChef India. He has written over 35 cookbooks and has hosted several cooking shows on television.

recipes.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.method: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices, cook in a tomato and cream-based sauce

recipes.name: Dal Makhani
recipes.method: Cook lentils and beans in tomato and cream-based gravy, add spices and fried onions

name: Madhur Jaffrey
bio: Madhur Jaffrey is an Indian-born actress, food and travel writer, and television personality. She is also a prolific author of cookbooks, and is known for bringing Indian cuisine to the western world through her books and cooking shows.

recipes.name: Chicken Curry
recipes.method: Cook chicken in onion-tomato based gravy with yogurt and spices

recipes.name: Saag Paneer
recipes.method: Cook spinach and spices, add fried paneer and tomato-onion gravy

recipes.name: Lamb Rogan Josh
recipes.method: Cook lamb in a yogurt and spice-based gravy with onions and tomatoes

name: Ranveer Brar
bio: Ranveer Brar is an Indian celebrity chef, television host, judge, and food stylist. He has hosted several cooking shows on television and is the author of multiple cookbooks. He is known for his innovative and contemporary take on traditional Indian cuisine.

recipes.name: Chicken Biryani
recipes.method: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices, layer with parboiled rice and fried onions, cook over low heat

recipes.name: Paneer Tikka
recipes.method: Marinate paneer and vegetables in yogurt and spices, grill until charred and tender

name: Atul Kochhar
bio: Atul Kochhar is an Indian-born, British-based Michelin-starred chef, restaurateur, and television personality. He is the owner and head chef of the acclaimed Benares restaurant in London, which serves modern Indian cuisine.

recipes.name: Lamb Rogan Josh
recipes.method: Cook lamb in a yogurt and spice-based gravy with onions and tomatoes

recipes.name: Baingan Bharta
recipes.method: Roast eggplant, cook with onions and tomatoes, add spices and garnish with cilantro

name: Hari Nayak
bio: Hari Nayak is an Indian chef, restaurateur, and cookbook author based in the United States. He has worked in several Michelin-starred restaurants and is known for his modern and inventive take on Indian cuisine.

recipes.name: Tandoori Chicken
recipes.method: Marinate chicken in yogurt, spices, lemon, and garlic, cook in a tandoor oven

recipes.name: Baingan Bharta
recipes.method: Roast eggplant, cook with onions and tomatoes, add spices and garnish with cilantro

recipes.name: Chana Masala
recipes.method: Cook chickpeas in an onion-tomato based gravy with spices, garnish with cilantro
